name: Ultimate Hallucination
description:
Welcome to Ultimate Hallucination!

Jump through a 3d world to reach the spire at the end (the giant pyramid).

All instructions shown in-game.

STORY:

You just fell asleep, but your dream is different. This is extremely real, and you cannot wake up. A strange voice tells you to reach the tall triangular structure in the map. But the world is turning upside-down with craziness.

WARNING: Players may get sick or have nausea while playing
